comment: If you are an American and you love America it does not matter what the color of your skin, you are an American. Thats for all you racist on Gab.
amr:
# ::snt If you are an American and you love America it does not matter what the color of your skin, you are an American. Thats for all you racist on Gab.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (m2 / matter-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (c / color-01
                        :ARG1 (s / skin
                              :part-of (y / you))))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (p / person
                        :mod (c2 / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "America"))
                        :domain (y2 / you))
                  :op2 (l / love-01
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG1 c2)))
      :snt2 (r / racist
            :domain (y3 / you)
            :topic (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Gab"))
            :mod (f / for-all)))
